entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle and a few flurries changing to snow this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
